job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the organization and design of data, a core component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing scalable and maintainable data pipelines that make data from REST APIs and SQL databases available in data warehouses, enabling data products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of data ingestion and transformation, which is fundamental to data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing data warehousing and data lakes, including automated data migrations.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions key data warehousing and data lake concepts, central to data engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up cloud infrastructure based on IaC (infrastructure as code, for example, in Bicep or Terraform).
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and managing cloud infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) is a key aspect of MLOps and operations engineering in a data context.

job_tasks.phrase: help our clients achieve their data-driven objectives.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of client business goals and how data contributes to them.
This phrase highlights the outcome of the data engineering work, connecting it to business value and product delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyzing existing data platforms and proposing structural improvements based on your findings.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding and optimizing existing data systems, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Staying up-to-date and sharing knowledge about the latest trends and technologies in data and AI.
job_tasks.justification: This directly speaks to the need for continuous learning and adapting to new information in the data and AI field.

soft_skills.phrase: work in a versatile team with Data Scientists, Data Analysts, Software Engineers, and DevOps consultants.
proposing structural improvements based on your findings.
Staying up-to-date and sharing knowledge about the latest trends and technologies in data and AI.

classification.rationale: This job description clearly outlines responsibilities centered around data pipelines, data warehousing, and cloud infrastructure management. While AI is mentioned as a domain, the core tasks and technologies are strictly those of a Data Engineer, not a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer.
